cards

Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • cards.Deck

  • public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
    A type of object that represents a set of two decks. The decks are made of the cards in the ArrayLists aDeck, which contains AnswerCards, and qDeck, which contains QuestionCards.
    Since:
    CAH1.0
    Version:
    CAH1.0
    Author:
    Holt Maki
    See Also:
    DeckBuilder, Card

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<AnswerCard> aDeck 
      private java.util.ArrayList<QuestionCard> qDeck 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Deck(java.util.ArrayList<AnswerCard> a, java.util.ArrayList<QuestionCard> q)
      Creates a set of two decks in the form of arrayLists There is an arrayList of AnswerCards and an arrayList of QuestionCards.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean answersEmpty()
      Checks wether or not the answer deck is empty
      AnswerCard drawAnswerCard()
      Draws an answer card Removes the card that is drawn from the deck
      QuestionCard drawQuestionCard()
      Draws a question card Removes the card that is drawn from the deck
      QuestionCard drawQuestionCardHappyEnding()
      Draws a question card, but will avoid drawing "Make a Haiku" until it is the last card remaining.

      • drawQuestionCardHappyEnding

        public QuestionCard drawQuestionCardHappyEnding()
        Draws a question card, but will avoid drawing "Make a Haiku" until it is the last card remaining. Removes the card that is drawn from the deck
        Returns:
        card - The question card that is drawn
        Since:
